meanings.definition: To ask (someone) to go somewhere or do something
meanings.sent1: She invites her friend to the park.
meanings.sent2: He always invites his classmates to his birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The picnic invites everyone for a fun day out.
meanings.sent4: The warm weather invites us to spend time outdoors.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flyer invites people to the community event.

meanings.definition: To request the presence or participation of
meanings.sent1: The teacher invites the students to join the science fair.
meanings.sent2: The wedding invitation invites guests to celebrate with the couple.
meanings.sent3: The music concert invites music lovers to enjoy a night of melodies.
meanings.sent4: The art exhibition invites visitors to explore creativity.
meanings.sent5: The charity event invites volunteers to make a difference.

meanings.definition: To attract or tempt by offering pleasure or advantage
meanings.sent1: The delicious smell of baking cookies invites everyone to the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful garden invites birds with its colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The tempting aroma of fresh coffee invites customers into the cafe.
meanings.sent4: The exciting movie trailer invites viewers to watch the film.
meanings.sent5: The cozy fireplace invites relaxation on a chilly evening.
